name: password detection in logs
description: here's the pattern to detect if a password is shown in a log
content:
password=***
userpass=***
userPassword=***
[10-03-2014] LOG : SEVERITY 4 : Nothing to say
iiqServicePassword=***
I'm not a log and I want to be seen
"iiqServicePassword" : "***"
"userPassword": [0x7b, 0x53, 0x53, 0x48, 0x41, ... ]  (hex notation)
This is a test
http.remote_pass":"***"
{op=Set, value=***, name=userPassword, args={secret=tr
author: Thierry Parmentier
